problem_text: Comet Halley orbits the Sun with a period of 76 years and, in 1986, had a distance of closest approach to the Sun, its perihelion distance $R_p$, of $8.9 \times 10^{10} \mathrm{~m}$. Table shows that this is between the orbits of Mercury and Venus. What is the eccentricity $e$ of the orbit of comet Halley?
